amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to detain, without conviction, any person for more than 15 years at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to detain, without conviction, any person for more than 15 years at the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
